Hi, after a few weeks away I tried to post an answer in the Stranger Unregarded forum at /forum/games/topic/5740/a-stranger-unregarded

But it rejects me with the message in red:

Woah there! Looks like you're making a lot of posts. Please wait for a bit and try posting again.

Though this is my first post in weeks, let alone today.

Posts.EditableText: I tried again and got the same message, but my post seems to have appeared regardless?
Posts.HTML: I tried again and got the same message, but my post seems to have appeared regardless?

Posts.EditableText:
I've had this a few times and I can only say what I said to another member who recently started a thread about a related glitch - and that is that the new forum doesn't seem particularly stable and is prone to strange behaviour at times.

I think you just have to ignore these glitches until they correct themselves.
